metadata.title: CVE-2023-38961 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflwo vulnerability in JerryScript Project jerryscript v.3.0.0allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via thescanner_is_context_needed component in js-scanner-until.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
